properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Brought safely by His hand thus far, Why wilt thou now give place to fear? How canst thou want if He provide, Or lose thy way with such a Guide?{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Did ever trouble yet befall, And He refuse to hear thy call? And has He not His promise passed, That thou shalt overcome at last?{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He who has helped me hitherto Will help me all my journey through, And give me daily cause to raise New Ebenezers to His praise.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
